LanguageData.DP_tickRateSingleTip: Special tick rate for the slow-mo crowd. Keeps wounds knitting while you sip coffee.
LanguageData.DP_tickRateTip: How often everyone gets their boo-boos patched up. RimWorld runs at 60 ticks a second, so 250 means healing every four seconds. Math is hard, but you get it.
LanguageData.DP_tickRateRareTip: Number of ticks before we try fancy stuff like regrowing limbs or erasing scars. Uses the base rate, not the slow-mo one.
LanguageData.DP_disableFlashstormTip: Stops beheading-induced flashstorms from burning everything. Because fire bad.
LanguageData.DP_firstDeathGrantsPowerSurgeTip: Toggle whether rookies can share their healing mojo before the first "oops" moment.
LanguageData.DP_ShowHealing: Shows the exact healing factor value, because who doesn't love stats?
LanguageData.DP_AllowBeheadAllTip: Lets you decapitate anyone, not just the special snowflakes.
LanguageData.DP_AllowBeheadAllLeavesHeadTip: Every beheading comes with a souvenir head. Collect them all!
LanguageData.DP_DeathEffectOnVal: Effect of deaths On healing factority,
LanguageData.DP_DeathEffectOnValTip: How much their healing mojo shifts every time they bite it.
LanguageData.DP_baseHealSpeedTip: Tweak this to decide how speedy the healing montage should be.
LanguageData.DP_scarHealSpeedTip: Multiplier for scar healing. Only ticks during rare moments, so don't hold your breath.
LanguageData.DP_healing: Bigger critters give more healing juice. Science!
Bigger bodies heal faster. Go figure.
LanguageData.DP_regrowSpeedTip: How quickly lost bits make a comeback tour.
LanguageData.DP_regrowMaxPartsTip: How many limbs can grow back at once. Vital organs ignore this rule because survival.
LanguageData.DP_regrowCostsNoFoodTip: Toggle this if you want regrowth to burn extra calories.
LanguageData.DP_regrowCostsFoodTip: How many meals the regrowing limb wolfs down.
LanguageData.DP_accumulateFoodNeedTip: Extra hunger while regenerating or dead. Because even corpses get snacky.
LanguageData.DP_perStageHpTip: How chunky each regrown part gets per healing stage.
LanguageData.DP_regrowLesserTip: Max HP of limbs a lesser factor can grow back. Baby steps.
LanguageData.DP_regrowHealing: Max HP for standard factor regrowth. Pretty standard.
LanguageData.DP_regrowGreaterTip: How tough the parts a greater factor can regrow.
LanguageData.DP_regrowHighTip: High factor regrowth limit. Because bigger is better.
LanguageData.DP_regrowGrandTip: Grand factor regrows beefier parts than you.
LanguageData.DP_regrowApexTip: Apex factor can regrow just about anything. Fear it.
LanguageData.DP_defaultAllTip: Hit this to reset stuff. Check the boxes first if you care.
LanguageData.DP_defaultHealing: Deletes every healing class and rebuilds them like new. Bold move.
LanguageData.DP_defaultDefaultHealing: Restores default healing numbers for anything not fancy enough for a class.
LanguageData.DP_defaultRegrowthTip: Back to factory settings for regrowth stages.
LanguageData.DP_defaultGeneralHealing: Resets general healing and regrowth rates. Boring but necessary.
LanguageData.DP_defaultGeneralTip: Rolls everything back to baseline. Tick rate, numbers, the works.
LanguageData.DP_defaultPowerSurgeChangeTip: Back to square one for PowerSurge transformations.
LanguageData.DP_defaultTransferTip: Resets how pawns swipe healing factor from heads and stunted pals.
LanguageData.DP_defaultHediffsTip: Back to the boring default conditions.
LanguageData.DP_removeHealing: Strips everyone of healing factor. No take-backs.
LanguageData.DP_addHealing: Attempts to bless everyone everywhere with healing factor. Sharing is caring.
LanguageData.DP_chanceTip: Chance a pawn secretly has the factor but no perks until they die once.
LanguageData.DP_chanceVisibleTip: Chance a pawn shows up already using their factor. They skip the awkward first death.
LanguageData.DP_Healing: Range of healing power new pawns spawn with.
Incoming healing power gets multiplied by this. Sharing is caring.
Outgoing healing juice is scaled by this. Give generously.
LanguageData.DP_learningMultTip: Multiplier for how much XP gets copied in a PowerSurge.
LanguageData.DP_passionChanceTip: Chance a pawn catches a passion during PowerSurge.
LanguageData.DP_passionChancesTip: How many rolls each PowerSurge gets for gaining passion.
LanguageData.DP_passionLossTip: Chance a PowerSurge robs passions instead of giving them.
LanguageData.DP_passionLimitTip: Caps total passions. Majors count double. -1 for no cap.
LanguageData.DP_categoriesTip: Dive into settings to tweak or delete healing classes.
LanguageData.DP_NewClassTip: Spawn a shiny new healing class to mess with.
LanguageData.DP_DeleteClassTip: Deletes a healing class forever. Slide the thingy all the way to confirm.
LanguageData.DP_slideConfirmTip: Slide right to prove you really, really mean it.
LanguageData.DP_Healing: Toggle whether this class can even spawn as healing factor.
Base chance for a pawn to pop out with healing factor.
Chance the newly spawned factor pawn gets bumped up a tier.
Pawns already enrolled in this class.
Pawns not in this class. Red means they're in no class at all.
Could not find {0} pawn defs from removed mods. They can be cleared in options. Missing defs: {1}
LanguageData.DP_stealStage1Tip: Chance to snag hidden factor from eating a plain healing head.
LanguageData.DP_stealStage2Tip: Chance to snag hidden factor from a greater head.
LanguageData.DP_stealStage3Tip: Chance to snag hidden factor from a high-tier head.
LanguageData.DP_stealStageTip: Chance to snag hidden factor from a grand head.
Chance to snag hidden factor from an apex head.
LanguageData.DP_MortalisMultiplierTip: Multiplier for X-Gene samples from the extractor.
LanguageData.DP_stuntedChacneTip: Chance that new healing factors turn out stunted.
LanguageData.DP_stuntedBurnChance: Chance a stunted healing factor self burns
LanguageData.DP_stuntedBurnChanceTip: Each rare tick, stunted factors might light themselves on fire. Burns reduce the stunted level.
LanguageData.DP_stuntedBurnRate: The severity of the self burns
LanguageData.DP_stuntedBurnRateTip: How nasty those self-inflicted burns are.
LanguageData.DP_conditionMaxTip: The maximum progress conditions should get to, every healing factor tick they will be set to this value if it is over this value. Conditions have a lethal severity of 1 and are non-tendable like bloodloss or malnutrition.
LanguageData.DP_diseaseMaxTip: The maximum progress diseases should get to, every healing factor tick they will be set to this value if it is over this value. Diseases have a lethal severity of 1 and are tendable like infections of flu.
LanguageData.DP_hediffShowOnlyBadTip: Hides all hediffs that have isBad set to false
LanguageData.DP_hediffShowOnlyConditionTip: Hides all hediffs that do not have a lethal severity
LanguageData.DP_hediffShowOnlyCustomTip: Hides all hediffs that do not have custom settings.
LanguageData.DP_conditionTip: A condition hediff has a lethal severity of 1 and is non-tendable such as bloodloss or malnutrition.
LanguageData.DP_diseaseTip: A disesase hediff has a lethal severity of 1 and is tendable such as the flu or an infection.
LanguageData.DP_otherTip: Hediffs that don't fit into the other categories.
LanguageData.DP_hediffMaxProgressTip: The maximum progress this hediff should get to, every tick it will be set to this value if it is over this value.
LanguageData.DP_hediffHealSpeedTip: A multiplier for how fast this hediff heals. If set to 0 it will ignore this hediff
LanguageData.DP_hediffneedToCureTip: Does a pawn need to cure this hediff before it revives
LanguageData.DP_hediffCanGetTip: Should a pawn be able to get this hediff? This doesn't full stop a pawn from getting a hediff it just removes it when the healing factority healing ticks
LanguageData.DP_hediffRegrowTip: Hediffs with this enabled will be *saved* to pawns every rare tick and when a hediff is missing that was there before it will be re-added.
LanguageData.DP_hediffLoadMissing: Healing Factors could not find {0} hediffs, it is possible they are from unloaded mods. You may clear these old hediff settings in the healing factors options page, or leave them as they are harmless. These are the hediffs defs: {1}
LanguageData.DP_CanGetDiseaseTip: Will cure healing factors of diseases if they contract them, a disease if any tendable fatal hediff.
LanguageData.DP_CanGetConditionsTip: Will cure healing factors of any conditions, a condition is any non-tendable fatal hediff
LanguageData.DP_diseaseMaxProg: Stops the progress of a lethal disease at:
LanguageData.DP_diseaseMaxProgTip: Anything that is tendable with a lethal severity of 100% this includes things like infections and the flu. Set to 100% to disable
LanguageData.DP_conditionMaxProg: Stops the progress of a lethal condition at:
LanguageData.DP_conditionMaxProgTip: Anything that is not tendable with a lethal severity of 100% this includes things like bloodloss and heatstroke
LanguageData.DP_firstDeathHeal: Healing speed prior to first resurrection:
LanguageData.DP_firstDeathHealTip: The healing speed of an healing factor after they have died their first death and before they have respawned. Changes how long they will be dead on their first death.
LanguageData.DP_maxPartSizeTip: Limits the maximum part Hp any healing factor can regrow.
LanguageData.DP_maxPartStage: The maximum base part Hp added to calculate parts they can regrow when an healing factor is at the {0} stage
LanguageData.DP_severityMaxPartTip: This value is multiplied by the severity of the healing factor hediff. This value is then added to per stage values.
LanguageData.DP_severityCheckTip: Tool to see how specific severities would affect max part Hp
LanguageData.DP_editShowChanged: Show only the hediffs you've messed with
LanguageData.DP_editShowNonLethal: Display all the annoying but not deadly ones
LanguageData.DP_editNoMaxTip: This one progresses normally, no cap.
LanguageData.DP_editDisabled: This condition is disabled for healing factors
LanguageData.DP_editCanGet: Allow healing factors to get this condition?
LanguageData.DP_editHealHediff: Let this condition heal by itself?
LanguageData.DP_Designator_ExtractorTriggerDesc: Use this healing factor pawn to trigger an X-Gene extractor.
LanguageData.DP_GainNoBrainCheatTip: Pawns at this level can live without their brains. Takes a bit to kick in.
LanguageData.DP_NoBrainCheatTip: Keeps colonists alive after brain loss. Turn it off and they drop.
